column4: Ok.. Gutsy laptop , running an e100 intel ethernet card, the link goes up and down and most times I do not have internet/networking, I cant seem to get internet nor networking to work correctly on this laptop, anyone have an idea
could it be a router issue?
router is fine, other 2-3 computers are accessing the internet and pinging eachother
you using the network manager? or via command line
is this the computer you are on now? if so, how are you connected; if not, can you access that computer now
no its another laptop i have connected to ethernet
open network, wep, wpa, wpa2 what
ethernet wont work? I thought this was a wireless question...
do you start up the computer with the ethernet cable plugged in, or plug it in after start up
